text: A traveler finds in the countryside a character with a head as smooth as an egg, without a single trait. Terrified, he gets on a wagon and asks the farmer to drop the horse immediately. - What's the matter? - the farmer asks. - It was that I saw a man whose face was as smooth as an egg. "Then", replied the peasant, turning around, "did he have the same face as I did? Japanese FIN Anonymous
title: Un huevo
author: nan Anónimo
